creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: rectangular box with rounded edges and corners; removable cover; black lacquer with gold and mother-of-pearl irises; raised zigzagging walking path made of boards on stilts made of branches; interior has Art Deco-like wave design
signed: on underside, in gold: two-line inscription; on bottom, in red: round seal-like inscription
title: Accessories Box with Irises at Yatsuhashi
